title: Coprimality and Euclid's lemma
content: According to Wikipedia "Coprime integers", see ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coprime_integers (16-Aug-2020) "[[...] two integers a and b are said to be _relatively prime_, mutually prime, or _coprime_ [[...] if the only positive integer (factor) that divides both of them is 1. Consequently, any prime number that divides one does not divide the other. This is equivalent to their greatest common divisor (gcd) being 1.". In the following, we use this equivalent characterization to say that ` A e. ZZ ` and ` B e. ZZ ` are coprime (or relatively prime) if ` ( A gcd B ) = 1 `. The equivalence of the definitions is shown by ~ coprmgcdb . The negation, i.e. two integers are not coprime, can be expressed either by ` ( A gcd B ) =/= 1 `, see ~ ncoprmgcdne1b , or equivalently by ` 1 < ( A gcd B ) `, see ~ ncoprmgcdgt1b . A proof of Euclid's lemma based on coprimality is provided in ~ coprmdvds (see ~ euclemma for a version of Euclid's lemma for primes).

blocks.name: coprmgcdb
blocks.content: Two positive integers are coprime, i.e. the only positive integer that divides both of them is 1, iff their greatest common divisor is 1. (Contributed by AV, 9-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm coprmgcdb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wb(wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1))
  mpdan(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wi(wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  nnz(c0)
  nnz(c1)
  gcddvds(c0, c1)
  mpid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1))), wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1))), wi(wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), wi(wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1))), wcel(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cn))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cn))
  gcdnncl(c0, c1)
  rspcv(s0, co(c0, cgcd, c1), cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), wi(wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1))
  breq1(cv(s0), co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0)
  breq1(cv(s0), co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)
  eqeq1(cv(s0), co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))))
  ralrimiva(s0, cn, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))
  syld(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)))
  syl(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn))))
  anim1ci(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)))
  simpl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1))
  3anass(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn))
  nndvdslegcd(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  adantll(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))
  sylbid(wa(wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, nat1))
  adantr(wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, nat1)))
  breq2(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1, cv(s0), cle)
  adantl(wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))
  mpan2d(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(s0)))
  nnge1(cv(s0))
  biimprd(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))
  letri3d(cv(s0), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nnre(cv(s0))
  1red(wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  diff.wi.s(s0, wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)
  diff.cdvds.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cgcd, c1)
  diff.cgcd.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ncoprmgcdne1b
blocks.content: Two positive integers are not coprime, i.e. there is an integer greater than 1 which divides both integers, iff their greatest common divisor is not 1. (Contributed by AV, 9-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ncoprmgcdne1b(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wb(wrex(s0, cfv(cuz, nat2), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1))), wne(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wrex(s0, cfv(cuz, nat2), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1))), wne(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wrex(s0, cn, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))), wn(wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))))
  rexbidv2(s0, cfv(cuz, nat2), cn, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1))))
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))))
  jca(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  eluz2nn(cv(s0))
  anim1ci(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))
  simplbiim(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wne(cv(s0), nat1))
  neneq(cv(s0), nat1)
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1))))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  impcom(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  adantl(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2))))
  ex(wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  sylibr(wa(wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wne(cv(s0), nat1)))
  anim1ci(wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wne(cv(s0), nat1))
  neqne(cv(s0), nat1)
  eluz2b3(cv(s0))
  simprrl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wb(wrex(s0, cn, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))), wn(wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))))))
  rexanali(s0, cn, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))
  necon3bbid(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))))
  coprmgcdb(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ncoprmgcdgt1b
blocks.content: Two positive integers are not coprime, i.e. there is an integer greater than 1 which divides both integers, iff their greatest common divisor is greater than 1. (Contributed by AV, 9-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: coprmdvds1
blocks.content: If two positive integers are coprime, i.e. their greatest common divisor is 1, the only positive integer that divides both of them is 1. (Contributed by AV, 4-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm coprmdvds1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wi(w3a(wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wceq(c2, nat1)))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wi(w3a(wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wceq(c2, nat1)))
  syl6bir(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wi(w3a(wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wceq(c2, nat1)), wral(hs0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))))
  coprmgcdb(hs0, c0, c1)
  com12(wral(hs0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))), w3a(wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wceq(c2, nat1))
  3impib(wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1), wi(wral(hs0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))), wceq(c2, nat1)))
  com23(wcel(c2, cn), wa(wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wral(hs0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))), wceq(c2, nat1))
  rspcv(hs0, c2, cn, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1)), wi(wa(wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wceq(c2, nat1)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wa(wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wceq(c2, nat1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c1), wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c2, cdvds, c0)
  breq1(cv(hs0), c2, cdvds, c1)
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wceq(c2, nat1)))
}

blocks.name: coprmdvds
blocks.content: Euclid's Lemma (see ProofWiki "Euclid's Lemma", 10-Jul-2021, ~ https://proofwiki.org/wiki/Euclid's_Lemma ): If an integer divides the product of two integers and is coprime to one of them, then it divides the other. See also theorem 1.5 in [ApostolNT] p. 16. Generalization of ~ euclemma . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm coprmdvds(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)))
} = {
  impcomd(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wi(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)))
  biimpd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))
  bitrd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, co(c1, cgcd, c0))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, co(c1, cgcd, c0)))))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, co(c1, cgcd, c0)))))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, co(c1, cgcd, c0))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, c1)))

blocks.name: coprmdvds2
blocks.content: If an integer is divisible by two coprime integers, then it is divisible by their product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm coprmdvds2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

blocks.name: rpmulgcd2
blocks.content: If ` M ` is relatively prime to ` N ` , then the GCD of ` K ` with ` M x. N ` is the product of the GCDs with ` M ` and ` N ` respectively. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: qredeq
blocks.content: Two equal reduced fractions have the same numerator and denominator. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 29-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: qredeu
blocks.content: Every rational number has a unique reduced form. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 29-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: rpmul

blocks.name: coprmprod
blocks.content: The product of the elements of a sequence of pairwise coprime positive integers is coprime to a positive integer which is coprime to all integers of the sequence. (Contributed by AV, 18-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm coprmprod(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wf(c2, cn, cn), wral(s0, c0, wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cgcd, c1), nat1))), wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cgcd, cfv(c2, cv(s1))), nat1))), wceq(co(cprod(s0, c0, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cgcd, c1), nat1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

blocks.name: coprmproddvds
blocks.content: If a positive integer is divisible by each element of a set of pairwise coprime positive integers, then it is divisible by their product. (Contributed by AV, 19-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm coprmproddvds(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wss(c0, cn), wcel(c0, cfn)), wa(wcel(c1, cn), wf(c2, cn, cn)), wa(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cgcd, cfv(c2, cv(s1))), nat1))), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdvds, c1)))), wbr(cprod(s0, c0, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cdvds, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3imp(wa(wss(c0, cn), wcel(c0, cfn)), wa(wcel(c1, cn), wf(c2, cn, cn)), wa(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cgcd, cfv(c2, cv(s1))), nat1))), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdvds, c1))), wbr(cprod(s0, c0, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cdvds, c1))
